Text: helloHey Jeff Have a favor to ask Trying to get clarification on the Enron balance sheet If you have some time can we speak about various aspects of the business I know you are busy and not necessarily as familiar with the off balances sheet structures but perhaps you could be of some assistance I think your the smartest guy I know that still works there Maybe its your Penn roots I am in Houston over Thanksgiving Perhaps we can finally get that long awaited drink you owe me If in London please give me a call I have a great place here you are welcome to crash at Barry Steinhart HBV Capital Management St James London SWA JT
